title: Senior Front-End Developer
text:
At Studio Forma, I lead front-end development for a variety of fast-paced client projects, focusing on performance, accessibility, and scalable design systems.

  • Designed and developed websites for SaaS startups, agencies, and creatives.
  • Specialized in performant, accessible layouts using Astro, React, and Tailwind.
  • Created custom design systems and component libraries for long-term scalability.

title: UI Designer & Webflow Developer
text:
As part of the design team at Glowhaus, I worked closely with branding and strategy teams to bring visually rich, responsive websites to life.

  • Led UI design for 15+ brand websites and marketing campaigns.
  • Developed responsive layouts in Webflow with custom interactions.
  • Collaborated closely with branding teams to elevate visual identity.

title: Junior Web Designer & Content Creator
text:
I joined Blueframe as a junior designer, contributing to both internal and client projects while growing my front-end development skills.

  • Created landing pages and eCommerce layouts for direct-to-consumer brands.
  • Supported senior designers and developers on cross-functional teams.
  • Contributed to WordPress theme styling and mobile-first design improvements.
